item.title: Budget-Friendly 10g pfSense Build with HP t740 for Effortless Networking
item.description: Discover how to effortlessly build a 10 gigabit capable pfSense router and firewall on a budget using the HP t740, ensuring high-performance networking for your needs.

item.title: Running pfSense on the HP t740 Thin Client: Tips and Troubleshooting Guide
item.category: "pfSense" , "OPNsense" , "HardenedBSD" , "HP t740" , "thin client" , "home server" , "PPPoE" , "FreeBSD" , "boot prompt" , "loader.conf.local" , "nano editor" , "SSD detection" , "M.2 SSD" , "Western Digital" , "troubleshooting" , "post-installation" , "UART" , "ESXi" , "Proxmox"
item.description: Learn how to set up pfSense on the HP t740 Thin Client, and how to troubleshoot potential issues like freezing and SSD detection problems.
